page.title: 02AN INTRODUCTION TO DUNDONALD
page.content: Life in our area centres around the small village of {DUNDONALD}(Pop.3000) Dundonald is set amongst farmland about 4km from the sea. The village is dominated by an ancient castle built in the 13th Century and from which Scotland was ruled for a time. There are quite a few other interesting buildings near the area including, Old Auchans Castle, Dankeith House and Coodham House. Also to be seen locally is the site of an Iron Age fort on a nearby hilltop. Dundonald village itself is made up of four housing areas, old and new. In the early 1960's some factories were built providing employment locally. Unfortunately most of these have now closed and there is a lot of unemployment in our area.
